chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall p q r : list (Term A n), eqP A eqA n p q -> canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> canonical A0 eqA ltM q -> canonical A0 eqA ltM r -> eqP A eqA n (pluspf p r) (pluspf q r)

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
mult_mon : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon d -> mon d
pluspf = fun l1 l2 : list (Term A n) => projsig1 (list (Term A n)) (fun a : list (Term A n) => plusP (fst (l1, l2)) (snd (l1, l2)) a) (plusp (l1, l2)) : list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) Arguments pluspf (_ _)%list_scope
canonical : forall A : Type, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> forall n : nat, (mon n -> mon n -> Prop) -> list (Term A n) -> Prop
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
eqP : forall A : Type, (A -> A -> Prop) -> forall n : nat, list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> Prop
OrderStructure : forall A : Type, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> (A -> A -> A) -> Prop
zero_mon : forall d : nat, mon d
Inductive mon : nat -> Set := n_0 : mon 0 | c_n : forall d : nat, nat -> mon d -> mon (S d) Arguments mon _%nat_scope Arguments c_n (_ _)%nat_scope
CoefStructure : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A), A -> forall eqA : A -> A -> Prop, (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A) -> Prop
ssrbool.is_inleft : ?A + {?B} -> bool where ?A : [A : Type A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n ->...-> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) |- Prop]
eqp_imp_canonical : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (p q : list (Term A n)), eqP A eqA n p q -> canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> canonical A0 eqA ltM q
pluspf_assoc : forall p q r : list (Term A n), canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> canonical A0 eqA ltM q -> canonical A0 eqA ltM r -> eqP A eqA n (pluspf (pluspf p q) r) (pluspf p (pluspf q r))
ltp_eqp_comp : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (p q r s : list (Term A n)), ltP (A:=A) ltM p q -> canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> canonical A0 eqA ltM q -> eqP A eqA n p r -> eqP A eqA n q s -> ltP (A:=A) ltM r s

eqTerm_trans : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall n : nat, transitive (Term A n) (eqTerm eqA (n:=n))
eqTerm_sym : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall n : nat, symmetric (Term A n) (eqTerm eqA (n:=n))
eqp_sym : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall n : nat, symmetric (list (Term A n)) (eqP A eqA n)

pluspf_inv2_eqa : forall (a : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) -> canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a q) -> pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pluspf p q) = pluspf p (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a q)
canonical_cons : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (l : list (Term A n)) (a b : Term A n), ltT (A:=A) ltM b a -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b l) -> canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b l))
canonical_pX_eqT : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (a b : Term A n) (p : list (Term A n)), canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) -> eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b p)

```coq
intros p q r H1 H2 H3 H4.
unfold eqP.
intros H5 H6 H7 H8.
unfold canonical in *.
rewrite H5 in *.
rewrite H6 in *.
rewrite H7 in *.
rewrite H8 in *.
unfold pluspf.
unfold projsig1.
unfold plusP.
rewrite H1.
reflexivity.
```

original: intros p q r H1 H2 H3 H4. unfold eqP. intros H5 H6 H7 H8. unfold canonical in *. rewrite H5 in *. rewrite H6 in *. rewrite H7 in *. rewrite H8 in *. unfold pluspf. unfold projsig1. unfold plusP. rewrite H1. reflexivity.
